fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Suicide (Any): At the end of the night, you will deal an Overkill attack to yourself. This ability cannot fail, under any circumstances
-Lacerate (Day): Cause a player to bleed instantaneously. They will know this, and will die in two nights unless healed. 3 uses.
-Distract (Day): Silence a player for the rest of the day. They cannot talk or use abilities. 3 uses.
-Assassinate (Night): Kill a player at night.
-Two-For-One (Night): Kill two players at night. 1 use. Call now!

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If you are the starting Assassin and the Mastermind dies, you will take their place.
Anyone promoted to Assassin will **not** reset charges of Lacerate, Distract, and Two-For-One. Any depleted abilities stay depleted for a new Assassin.
